entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with drizzle. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Periods of rain beginning late in the evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
